reviewText:
Just what I wanted, thank you.

Sincerely,

Michael Browne

Love the Funimation redux of the first two DBZ sagas.  Only problem here is that the disk was loose (again) and the disk is all scratched up.  I would pay the extra if the stores around here would stock them.  Just so I didn't have to worry about dmgd products like this.  And no, sending back is not much of an option.
